original_text: He said to me, ‘Son of man, eat what you can see in front of you. Eat this scroll with words on it. Then go and speak to the Israelites.’
korean_text: 또 그가 내게 이르시되 인자야 너는 발견한 것을 먹으라 너는 이 두루마리를 먹고 가서 이스라엘 족속에게 말하라 하시기로

sentences.original_text: eat what you can see in front of you
Eat this scroll with words on it
Then go and speak to the Israelites'
